summary.Title: SushiArt is looking for experienced sushichefs
summary.JobHeadline: SushiArt is looking for experienced sushichefs

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: SushiArt is looking for experienced sushichefs
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
SushiArt is one of the biggest sushi chains in Denmark and is expanding. We are now looking for new skillful, ambitious and experienced chefs.

 

Your main tasks:
- Preparation of ingredients and materials (rice, vegetables, fish) for sushi production
- Production of different Sushi maki rolls and Nigiri
- Responsible for food hygiene and quality-control
- Maintaining a clean work environment.

 

Your profile:
- Ability to work in a fast-paced work environment
- You love to work in a team
- Sense of responsibility

- At least 5 years of experience as a sushi chef 

 

 

We are looking for applicants that can start within a short period of time. 

Please inform when applying, if your work VISA is required or if you have European passport or Ukrainian documents.

For the right candidate, you will be a part of a great team. We value our employees, and we are looking for long term relations.

For more information, please contact us by email: esbjerg@sushiart.dk  

Please send your application directly to esbjerg@sushiart.dk and please write “Sushi chef” in the subject title.

Occupation.Name: Kok
AlternateNames: Kok med speciale i bagværk og kager
